title: Massive Folcroft Apt Available
description:
This apartment is perfect for those that want a quiet safe neighborhood while still being close to the activity and convenience of Philly. The house was built in 1910 so it has a lot of old-school charm you won't find elsewhere.
With just over 1200 sq ft of space, it comes with a full size living room, dining room, and kitchen. With 12' ceilings what was already quite sizeable feels even bigger. The bathroom is even newly remodeled. It sits on a double lot so there is plenty of backyard for a furry friend to run around in. It is also conveniently located 2 blocks from the train into Center City and about 7 minutes north of the airport.

Central AC

title: Airy 2-BR + all utilities included (restrictions apply)
description:
Options available: Month-2-Month lease or yearly, furnished, unfurnished or partially furnished, reduced rate based on usage of unit
Airy 2 BR unit in a partially in-ground basement with a large egress window and sliding glass patio door.  Tucked-away yet centrally located near shopping centers and major roads (I95 & Rt 40).  Ample street parking.  Only minutes from downtown scenic Main St, restaurants/coffee shops, marinas, golf, Elk Neck State Park and beach.  Fully embraced by nature and wildlife.  The crickets and owls will sing you to sleep.
Sorry, unit is not handicap accessible.  There are steps leading to the unit’s entrance.
Central AC/Heat controlled by the upstairs unit.
Bedrooms have walk-in closets and ceiling fans.  No AC individually controlled system in bedrooms but there is an additional window AC in LR.  Individually controlled baseboard heat in every room.
Dehumidifier can keep the unit at a steady 65 degrees Fahrenheit and humidity at 55% or lower depending on setting.
Sewer water is pumped up and into the sewer line.  When activated the sewer pump will make a loud noise in the bathroom.  The pump system has been encased within a noise reduction box, but some people may find the noise disruptive.
Spacious bathroom with timed heater, magnifying mirror, utility rack, and handle bar.
Glass sliding door entrance leads to a well-maintained partially wooded backyard and a walk out patio with seating arrangements.
Unit has a long standing 4.5 out of 5 rating in Air BnB.
Non-smokers, no pets.
*** By choosing to stay at this locale you agree that you waive the right to claims under Landlord’s insurance and you do not hold Landlord accountable for losses.

title: NEW TownHome - Perfect for UPenn/HUP professionals
description:
https://view.ricohtours.com/6cf9ed56-91ae-4722-ba61-987c2d3b78c8 (Link to Virtual Tour)
Walking distance to HUP, UPenn and University City. Designer touches are on full display in this stylish Walnut Hill home that combines the soul and charm of a classic Philadelphia townhome with luxurious new finishes. Completely re-built interior with an impeccable mindfulness to detail & craftsmanship. Custom designed mudroom with all of the modern details. Gorgeous hardwood flooring, a stunning exposed brick accent wall, strategically placed dimmers throughout adding to the warm & a cost savings benefit. A plethora of natural sunlight is prevalent throughout this home with all of the extra windows. The designer eat in kitchen offers gleaming white cabinetry with under-mount lighting, porcelain white farmhouse sink, white subway tile backsplash & beautiful quartz countertops. You will be amazed with the Chef's table which will be cornerstone for entertaining & gathering with family and friends. Stainless-steel appliances that include a 5-burner gas range, dishwasher, refrigerator & range hood. Access to the enclosed rear yard. You will be delighted with the living room with boasts a beautiful fireplace to enjoy and reduced energy costs. Upstairs, there are 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. Primary bedroom has private bath access. Primary bathroom is beautifully tiled & gorgeous vanity & mirror. Well-appointed hall bathroom is beautifully equipped with custom tile with a reclaimed wood vanity & gorgeous mirror. Add convenience of upper level laundry room with a hook up for a washer and dryer. Impressive bonus room with stunning exposed stone wall that would be media room, office, or gym.  Added benefit of being located in the Penn Catchment plus special incentives with Penn. Walk Score 94, Transit Score 74, Bike Score 89. In close proximity to Malcolm X Park, Barkan Park, Reanimator Coffee, 48th St & dining & shopping along Baltimore Ave.
Can provide some furnishing upon request.

Lovely 2 bed/1bath Rogers Hill Spur-style casita in the heart of Waco, TX. 2 blocks from main square, restaurants, bakery, coffee shops and summer farmer's market. Front entrance has wrought iron security door into a newly built mudroom (a rarity on the west side!). Original hardwood floors and bright newer windows throughout the main level. The full bath has new vanity, cabinets, shelves and shower head. Open kitchen has all stainless steel appliances, ample cabinet space, a pantry and beautiful tile floor. Sink has detachable spray head and filtered water tap. Den has new carpet, high ceilings, gas fireplace and sliding glass door into backyard with well-kept lawn and shed. The basement has fresh paint, a new washer and dryer and extra storage space. Converted garage currently being used as an office.
Library, parks and local schools all within walking distance This has been our family home for the last 9 years and it is at the peak of functionality!
Renter qualifications/rental terms:
-Monthly rent should not exceed 1/3 of gross monthly income.
-1 year lease.
-$800 due at signing (last month's rent + $500 refundable deposit).
-Move in date Oct. 1st
-Well behaved pets allowed (with additional $300 deposit per pet)
-No smoking inside.
-Owner pays for garbage (trash+recycling). Tenant pays for electricity, gas, water, internet.
-Property has a driveway, garage and storage shed and all are available for tenant's use.

title: Large Mother-in-law Suite,Lots of Light, New kitchen, Cat Friendly
description:
Do you find yourself watching the world go by. Well here is a chance to get a birds eye view of the world in the heart of University City. Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: Renovated Townhome with New Kitchen and Yard, Pet Freindly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023
